entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
